summary: Meditation app with pre-meditation and meditation pages; enhance meditation page navigation and timer visuals.

existing_features.title: Add a back button to the active meditation view (the in-session screen) that navigates back to the pre-meditation page route (`/pre-meditation`).

Replace the current meditation timer visual on the active meditation view with an animated, calm wave fill indicator that fills from bottom to top as time progresses (start empty at session start; half full at halfway point; fully filled when time remaining reaches 0).

When the meditation duration or remaining time is adjusted (e.g., via seeking/setting controls), animate the fill level to the new target using an ease-in-out transition rather than jumping immediately.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a back button on the meditation page that navigates back to the pre-meditation page.

Replace the meditation timer with an animated wave-style fill indicator that fills bottom-to-top smoothly based on elapsed meditation time (starts empty; 0 min left = fully filled) with ease-in-out when duration is adjusted.

projectName: Add back button on meditation view and replace timer with bottom-to-top wave fill indicator
